      public static Agent fromLLMAndTools(BaseLanguageModel llm, List<BaseTool> tools, Map<String,Object> kwargs)
      Construct an agent from an LLM and tools. This method will be called by the Initialize.initializeAgent(java.util.List<com.hw.langchain.tools.base.BaseTool>, com.hw.langchain.base.language.BaseLanguageModel, com.hw.langchain.agents.agent.types.AgentType) using MethodUtils.invokeStaticMethod.
